name: ContinuosHeating
comment: -26=off, when the outside temperature falls below this threshold temperature the continuous heating function is started (off <=> function is disabled)

name: FrostOverRideTime
comment: delay before frost protection is activated

name: AdaptHeatCurve
comment: automatic correction of configured heat curve

name: SolarFlowRateQuantity
comment: preset flow rate solar circuit for solar yield calculation

name: HcAlternativePoint
comment: exclusively alternate heating below alternative point (-21=off)

name: HwcLegionellaTime
comment: Time hot water legionella run is scheduled (when HwcLegionellaDay is not 0)

name: HwcLegionellaDay
comment: Day hot water legionella run is scheduled

name: OffsetOutsideTemp
comment: Offset outside temperature (used to determined DisplayedOutsideTemp)

name: FM5Config
comment: FM5 VR71 module configuration (possible range 1-11 for VRC720 and FM5 used values are 1 2 3 and 6)

name: DewPointOffset
comment: Subtract from z1RoomTemp to get dew point

name: ESCOBlockFunction
comment: Function to deactivate when Energy Supply Company sends a blocking signal

name: HwcMaxFlowTempDesired
comment: maximum flow temperature setpoint of Hwc

name: PrEnergySumHwcThisMonth
[comment]: this months energy consumption hot water

name: PrFuelSumHwcThisMonth
[comment]: this months fuel consumption hot water

name: PrEnergySumHwcLastMonth
[comment]: last months energy consumption hot water

name: PrFuelSumHwcLastMonth
[comment]: last months fuel consumption hot water

name: MaintenanceDue
comment: zeigt an ob die Wartung fällig ist

name: HwcCircPumpStatus
comment: Hwc circulation pump status (also turns on during a legionella run)

name: HwcTempDesired
comment: setpoint of domestic hot water circuit

name: Hc1DewPointMonitoring
comment: Dew point monitoring enable/disable for Hc1

name: Hc1ActualFlowTempDesired
comment: current flow temperature setpoint of Hc1

name: Hc1DewPointOffset
[comment]: Hc1 Temperature offset from dew point
comment: Dew point temperature margin for Hc1

name: Hc1ExcessTemp
comment: excess temperature of Hc1 (flow temperature's setpoint is increased by this value to keep the mixing valve in its control range)

name: Hc1DesiredSetbackTemp
comment: target setback temperatur Hc1 (fixed circuit type)

name: Hc1AutoOffMode
comment: operation of Hc1 during the lowering time; no influence if room temperature modulation is set to thermostat

name: Hc1MaxFlowTempDesired
comment: maximum heating flow temperature setpoint (end emphasis) of Hc1

name: Hc1MinCoolingFlowTempDesired
comment: minimum cooling flow temperature setpoint of Hc1

name: Hc1MinFlowTempDesired
comment: minimum heating flow temperature setpoint (end emphasis) of Hc1

name: Hc1ExtHwcOpMode
comment: operation mode of external Hwc circuit

name: Hc1SummerTempLimit
[comment]: Switch off temperature threshold Heating Circuit 1
comment: if outside temperature > summer limit => heating is OFF;applies to comfort and night setback setpoint

name: Hc1ScreedDryingDay
comment: current day of screed Hc1 drying schedule (1 to 29 0=screed drying off)

name: Hc1ScreedDryingDesiredTemp
comment: current Hc1 screed drying desired temp

name: Hc1ExtHeatDemand
comment: indicator of external heat demand for Hc1

name: Hc1HeatCurveAdaption
comment: adaption applied to heating curve of Hc1

name: Hc2ActualFlowTempDesired
comment: current flow temperature setpoint of Hc2

name: Hc2ExcessTemp
comment: excess temperature of Hc2 (flow temperature's setpoint is increased by this value to keep the mixing valve in its control range)

name: Hc2AutoOffMode
comment: operation of Hc2 during the lowering time; no influence if room temperature modulation is set to thermostat

name: Hc2MaxFlowTempDesired
comment: maximum flow temperature setpoint (end emphasis) of Hc2

name: Hc2MinFlowTempDesired
comment: minimum flow temperature setpoint (end emphasis) of Hc2

name: Hc2SummerTempLimit
[comment]: summer outside switchoff temperature heating circuit 2
comment: if outside temperature > summer limit => heating is OFF;applies to comfort and night setback setpoint

name: Hc2HeatCurveAdaption
comment: adaption applied to heating curve of Hc2

name: Hc3ActualFlowTempDesired
comment: current flow temperature setpoint of Hc3

name: Hc3ExcessTemp
comment: excess temperature of Hc3 (flow temperature's setpoint is increased by this value to keep the mixing valve in its control range)

name: Hc3AutoOffMode
comment: operation of Hc3 during the lowering time; no influence if room temperature modulation is set to thermostat

name: Hc3MaxFlowTempDesired
comment: maximum flow temperature setpoint (end emphasis) of Hc3

name: Hc3MinFlowTempDesired
comment: minimum flow temperature setpoint (end emphasis) of Hc3

name: Hc3SummerTempLimit
[comment]: summer outside switchoff temperature heating circuit 3
comment: if outside temperature > summer limit => heating is OFF;applies to comfort and night setback setpoint

name: Hc3HeatCurveAdaption
comment: adaption applied to heating curve of Hc3

name: z1OpModeCooling
comment: operation mode for cooling of zone 1

name: z1HolidayStartPeriod
comment: start date of holidays for zone 1

name: z1HolidayEndPeriod
comment: end date of holidays for zone 1

name: z1RoomZoneMapping
comment: configures which room temperature is assigned to zone 1

name: z1ActualRoomTempDesired
comment: current room setpoint considering all basic conditions passed to the control algorithms

name: z1HolidayEndTime
comment: end time of holidays for zone 1

name: z1HolidayStartTime
comment: start time of holidays for zone 1

name: z1CoolingRoomTempDesiredManualControlled
[comment]: Desired Cooling Room Temperature Zone 1 manual controlled
comment: manual controlled desired cooling room temperature for zone 1

name: z1QuickVetoEndDate
[comment]: end date of Quick Veto mode Zone 1
comment: Quick Veto mode end date Zone 1

name: z1QuickVetoDuration
[comment]: Duration of Quick Veto mode in Hours Zone 1
comment: valid values are 0.5-12 in 0.5 increments (default 3) writing enables quick veto mode

name: z1BankHolidayStartPeriod
comment: start date of bank holidays for zone 1

name: z1BankHolidayEndPeriod
comment: end date of bank holidays for zone 1

name: z1QuickVetoEndTime
comment: manual override end time for zone 1

comment: configures which room temperature is assigned to zone 2

name: z2ActualRoomTempDesired
comment: current room setpoint considering all basic conditions passed to the control algorithms

name: z2Unknown15Temp
[comment]: (in noise reduction 24 otherwise 99 - max.air level?) temperature zone 2
